facts.content: My favorite song at the moment is Natural by Imagine Dragons
I have a American Bobtail Cat named Tiger
I am currently playing Zelda: Breath of The Wild
I'm born in China! I moved to Canada after middle school.
I like Mocha Coffee or Americano, depending on the day...
Bubble tea is life, brown rice green milk tea is my favorite.
I am currently trying to learn Typescript!
